name: Fake Lethal League
description:
This is a clone of Lethal League featuring 3 characters right now.

If you wish to play this game with a controller, please use JoyToKey.

If you like this game, please support the original by buying it on any platform where it's available (eg. Steam, Switch E-Shop).

Controls:

P1:

Arrow Keys - Movement

P - Jump

O - Swing

L = Taunt

P2:

W, A, S, D - Movement

E - Jump

R - Swing

F - Taunt

I don't know what I will do with this project in the future.
